Tool

NameFragmentation (Alternative)
ID16
Author(c) 2008 by O.Conrad
Specificationgrid

Description

(1) interior, if Density = 1.0 (2) undetermined, if Density > 0.6 and Density = Connectivity (3) perforated, if Density > 0.6 and Density - Connectivity > 0 (4) edge, if Density > 0.6 and Density - Connectivity < 0 (5) transitional, if 0.4 < Density < 0.6 (6) patch, if Density < 0.4 References: Riitters, K., Wickham, J., O'Neill, R., Jones, B., Smith, E. (2000): Global-scale patterns of forest fragmentation. Conservation Ecology 4(2): 3 http://www.ecologyandsociety.org/vol4/iss2/art3/
